description: This file defines data models related to rides in a carpool management system, including entities such as locations, time slots, ride offers, and ride requests, using Pydantic for data validation and serialization.

classes.name: Location
classes.description: Represents a flexible location that supports predefined presets and custom labels or addresses.

classes.name: TimeSlot
classes.description: Represents a flexible time slot supporting presets and custom datetime entries.

classes.name: RideOfferCreate
classes.description: Data model for creating a ride offer, including driver info, seats available, pickup/dropoff locations, and time slot.

classes.name: RideOffer
classes.description: Represents a ride offer entity, extending the creation model with additional fields like ID, status, and metadata.

classes.name: RideRequestCreate
classes.description: Data model for creating a ride request, including requester info, seats requested, pickup/dropoff locations, and time slot.

classes.name: RideRequest
classes.description: Represents a ride request entity, extending the creation model with ID, status, matched offer ID, and metadata.

ctags.name: Location
ctags.pattern: /^class Location(BaseModel):$/

ctags.name: RideOffer
ctags.pattern: /^class RideOffer(RideOfferCreate):$/

ctags.name: RideOfferCreate
ctags.pattern: /^class RideOfferCreate(BaseModel):$/

ctags.name: RideRequest
ctags.pattern: /^class RideRequest(RideRequestCreate):$/

ctags.name: RideRequestCreate
ctags.pattern: /^class RideRequestCreate(BaseModel):$/

ctags.name: TimeSlot
ctags.pattern: /^class TimeSlot(BaseModel):$/

ctags.name: address
ctags.pattern: /^    address: Optional[str] = Field(None, description="Optional address details")$/

ctags.name: custom_label
ctags.pattern: /^    custom_label: Optional[str] = Field(None, description="Custom location label when preset is /

ctags.name: custom_time
ctags.pattern: /^    custom_time: Optional[datetime] = Field(None, description="Custom time when preset is 'custo/

ctags.name: driver_id
ctags.pattern: /^    driver_id: str = Field(..., description="User ID of the offering driver")$/

ctags.name: dropoff_location
ctags.pattern: /^    dropoff_location: Location = Field(..., description="Dropoff location")$/

ctags.name: from_location
ctags.pattern: /^    from_location: Location = Field(..., description="Pickup location")$/

ctags.name: id
ctags.pattern: /^    id: str = Field(..., description="Ride offer ID")$/

ctags.name: id
ctags.pattern: /^    id: str = Field(..., description="Ride request ID")$/

ctags.name: matched_offer_id
ctags.pattern: /^    matched_offer_id: Optional[str] = Field(None, description="Matched ride offer ID if any")$/

ctags.name: meta
ctags.pattern: /^    meta: EntityMeta = Field(default_factory=EntityMeta, description="Metadata timestamps")$/

ctags.name: meta
ctags.pattern: /^    meta: EntityMeta = Field(default_factory=EntityMeta, description="Metadata timestamps")$/

ctags.name: pickup_location
ctags.pattern: /^    pickup_location: Location = Field(..., description="Pickup location")$/

ctags.name: preset
ctags.pattern: /^    preset: LocationPreset = Field(..., description="Preset location or 'custom'")$/

ctags.name: preset
ctags.pattern: /^    preset: TimeSlotPreset = Field(..., description="Preset time slot or 'custom'")$/

ctags.name: requester_id
ctags.pattern: /^    requester_id: str = Field(..., description="User ID of the requesting parent")$/

ctags.name: seats_available
ctags.pattern: /^    seats_available: int = Field(..., ge=1, description="Number of available seats")$/

ctags.name: seats_requested
ctags.pattern: /^    seats_requested: int = Field(..., ge=1, description="Number of seats requested")$/

ctags.name: status
ctags.pattern: /^    status: RideStatus = Field(default=RideStatus.pending, description="Request status")$/

ctags.name: status
ctags.pattern: /^    status: RideStatus = Field(default=RideStatus.pending, description="Ride status")$/

ctags.name: time_slot
ctags.pattern: /^    time_slot: TimeSlot = Field(..., description="Desired time of the ride")$/

ctags.name: time_slot
ctags.pattern: /^    time_slot: TimeSlot = Field(..., description="Time of the ride")$/

ctags.name: to_location
ctags.pattern: /^    to_location: Location = Field(..., description="Dropoff location")$/
